name: Fleeting Flames | Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive
name_original: Fleeting Flames | Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive
description:
Welcome to Fleeting Flames!

This is a game made for Ludum Dare 46, with the theme of "keep it alive".

In this game, you play as the astronaut Jack who has crash landed on a frigid cold planet. In order to survive, you must keep your fire alive. Your main goal is to escape the planet using fragments of your ship you lost in the crash.

This game includes:

  • 3 skins to use (2 unlockable)
  • 3 difficulty modes
  • A few references and easter eggs to locate...
  • There's more too it, but I'll let you find that for yourself.

This game was made using GDevelop 4, Audacity, Piskell, Bfxr, and BeepBox

Note: I apologize for the lack of subtitles. If you decide to play without audio, there is a tutorial menu in the top left of the main menu. Also, the references are fairly obscure, so if you're interested, look up AJR for a few hints  😉
